title: What Does Floating Feel Like?

quiz.question: What is another name for the feeling of floating in space?

title: Our Home, The Big Blue Ball
text: From the space station, Earth looks like a beautiful, giant blue marble with swirling white clouds. You can't see any countries or borders, just one amazing home that we all share.

quiz.question: What does the Earth look like from space?
options: A map with lines on it.

title: Eating in Orbit
text: Can you imagine your food floating away? That's why space food is specially packaged! Astronauts eat things like tortillas instead of bread, because bread makes too many crumbs that could float into important equipment.

quiz.question: Why do astronauts prefer tortillas to bread in space?
options: Bread makes too many floating crumbs.
quiz.correct_answer: Bread makes too many floating crumbs.
